titles.title: Calling on the President to resume the interpretation of section 1 of the 14th Amendment to the Constitution as originally intended and applied as law for a century.
Calling on the President to resume the interpretation of section 1 of the 14th Amendment to the Constitution as originally intended and applied as law for a century.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

committee.subcommittee: Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: This resolution expresses disapproval of birthright citizenship, under which a person born in the United States is deemed to be a U.S. citizen.
